column4: it my second day using Ubuntu Hoary and I wonder if, when released, I can upgrade Hoary to Breezer without actually taking away the whole OS and reinstall?
I believe you can do a dist-upgrade to move to Breezy, but I would recommend a fresh install.
Ok thanks! May I ask why?
Well, just to keep things clean and working =) upgrading to an essentially different system can cause problems sometimes.
